alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 3:26PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns County through 400 PM EST... At 325 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Durbin, or near Fruit Cove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Durbin, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee and Guana River State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
